
{{Client function}}
This function is used to get the name of a specified ped's current simplest [[/task.md|task]].<br>

''Note: See [[/getPedTask.md|getPedTask]] to get a all tasks.''

==Syntax==
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
string getPedSimplestTask ( ped thePed )
</syntaxhighlight>

===Required Arguments===
*'''thePed''': The [[/ped.md|ped]] whose [[/task.md|task]] you want to retrieve.

===Returns===
Returns a string representing the name of the ped's simplest, active [[/task.md|task]].

==Example==
This example prints the name of a player's simplest task to the chat, when they use the "sTask" command.
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
function showSTask ()
  local thetask = getPedSimplestTask ( getLocalPlayer() )
  outputChatBox ( getPlayerName ( getLocalPlayer() ) .. "'s simplest task is: " .. thetask )
end
addCommandHandler ( "sTask", showSTask )
</syntaxhighlight>
